```{r packages}
#| cache: false
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
```

```{r load}
profiles <- list.files("../data", pattern = "research_profiles_.*\\.csv", full.names = TRUE) |>
  sort(decreasing = TRUE) |>
  head(1) |>
  read.csv()

exclude_handles <- read_lines("../data/exclude_handles.txt")
```

The list is sortable, searchable, and playable. Have fun.
\
\

```{r rank}
#| cache: false
#| column: page
top <- profiles |>
  filter(!handle %in% exclude_handles) |>
  slice_max(order_by = centrality, n = 100, with_ties = FALSE) |>
  mutate(across(centrality, \(x) round(x, digits = 0)))

top |> select(handle, displayName, description, centrality) |>
  datatable(rownames = FALSE)
```
